name: The rhymth of life in Saigon
description: It was not until 1975 that Ho Chi Minh city has it name as today. Although being the young generation, I prefer the old name 'Saigon' as many natives and people that have long been used to the old one. The beauty of Saigon nowadays is a mixture of myriad features of both old and new in religions, cultures, architecture... So, let's come with me to enjoy the other side of Saigon: new but old-fashioned, crowded but calm.
